title: Resize Client Thank you for making it happen!!!! <3
body:
For those who have not read the changelogs, thank you Riot for making this possible I have been looking forward to a resize feature for so long. 

> Bigger (or smaller) is betterAdded ability to increase and decrease window size, by using the keystroke combinations ctrl + or ctrl - (ctrl 0 will restore the client to the default size). 

It looks really nice on my 27inch Screen, and when you resize and place the window correctly on the screen the task bar disappears so there is no hindrance when clicking anything else. 

Will get back with another post after a game to test if the screen changes location after game ends, but so far, thank you Rito {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
